pageTitle: NIS and NIS+ API Function Equivalents (NIS+ Transition Guide)
textBeforeTable: Table 4-5 NIS API and NIS+ API Equivalent Functions Table 4-5 contains a list of the NIS API functions and their NIS+ API equivalents, if they exist. To completely convert your site to NIS+, you must both change the name service and port all applications to NIS+. Any internally created applications that make NIS calls have to be modified to use NIS+ calls. Otherwise, you always have to run your NIS+ servers in NIS-compatibility mode, with all the drawbacks that this mode entails. External applications may force you to run your namespace in NIS-compatibility mode until they are updated, as well.
